explains: adj. 粗笨的；波浪起伏的；多块状物的

sentences.en: When the rice isn't cooked properly it goes lumpy and gooey.
sentences.cn: 米饭煮得不好会结块儿发粘。

sentences.en: The fingers were gnarled, lumpy, with long, curving nails suggestive of animal claws.
sentences.cn: 那些手指粗糙、不平，有着又长又弯的使人想起动物爪子的指甲。

sentences.en: Most moons are either round and smooth, or lumpy pieces of space rock.
sentences.cn: 大多数卫星要么是圆形的，要么是光滑的，要么是块状的太空岩石。
